works.description:
The work is an image of a mother in her  
goddess aspect in labour. It is being used knowingly by the perpetrator to
 
advertise womb healing on google+. I already asked him to remove the same 

image off the same event advertised on facebook. I also have in my  
possession copies of the conversation on his facebook event where he  
acknowledges that he is in breach of my copyright, also he was extremely  
abusive towards me at the time. Because he also made slurs on my financial
 
status and also made other threats that he would make me suffer for asking
 
him to remove my artwork i removed the conversation off his event on  
facebook, after making copies, when he finally removed the image. The fact
 
that he has already removed the image off facebook confirms that he is in 

breach of my copyright. Facebook takes copyright infringement seriously
and  
he knows this. I can furnish facebook files with the conversation content 

and the same infringed copyright included if requested by google to
satisfy  
google that he is knowingly in breach of my copyright on google. That he  
has reposted the same image in connection with the same advertising on  
google just shows that he is knowingly breaching my copyright again, this 

time it is obvious that he intends to disrespect my wishes and my rights  
even further. Therefore I request that this image is removed off google  
immediately.
